title: Subchapter C - RADIATION
content:
Subchapter C - RADIATION
State Regulations

Part 380 - Prevent and Control of Environmental Pollution by Radioactive Materials (Subpart 380-1 to 380-11)

Part 381 - Transporters Of Low-level Radioactive Waste (ยง 381.1 to 381.18)

Part 382 - REGULATION OF LOW-LEVEL RADIOACTIVE WASTE DISPOSAL FACILITIES
Part 383 - Regulations For Low-level Radioactive Waste Disposal Facilities Financial Assurance Requirements (Subpart 383-1 to 383-15)

Part 400 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
